name: 10 minute apocalypse
description:
10 minute apocalypse is a survival game made for LudumDare 51 under the theme "every 10 seconds"

Unfortunately the team had some scheduling issues so we didn't deliver up tp our best ability, nontheless, its a game with a complete loop *shrugs*

How to play:
WASD moves your character around
Hold shift to boost
There is NO RELOAD, every 10 seconds you regain your boost and ammo

Survive 10 minutes to win the game, tho its not balanced, therefore probably impossible

Team:
JuanRod
Mattia Ermolli
Nacho
Nickitus
